headline: Cheney says GOP lawmaker who called Trump a 'would-be tyrant' is right
author: Joseph Choi -
sentences: If you want a Congressman who supports political violence in Ukraine or in the United States Capitol, who supports party over country, who supports a would-be tyrant over the Constitution, and who makes decisions based solely on re-election, then Russell Fry is your candidate,? said Rice.

Trump has endorsed Republican primary challengers against both Cheney and Rice in their re-election races this year, seeking retribution against the lawmakers in his party who have spoken out against him.
Rep. Tom Rice (R-S.C.) on Saturday condemned Trump following a rally in South Carolina, calling him a "disaster" and a "would-be tyrant."
on Sunday made made it known that she agreed with a fellow GOP congress member who called former President Trump a "would-be tyrant."
Rice's GOP primary challenger state Rep. Russell Fry (R) spoke at Trump's rally in South Carolina on Saturday night.
Both Rice and Cheney were among the 10 GOP House members who voted to impeach Trump after the Jan. 6 Capitol attack.
Sharing a copy of The Hill's article on Rice's remarks on Twitter, Cheney wrote, "@RepTomRice is right.
"Our country needs Republicans to be sane, responsible, and speak the truth," wrote Cheney.
Rice criticized Fry, accusing him of supporting a "would-be tyrant over the Constitution."
Rice accused Trump of being "consumed by spite."
Most of our Republican colleagues know this.
